json
{
  "name": "gestion-projet",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Application de gestion de projet avec React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB, authentification JWT, upload de fichiers, notifications en temps réel avec Socket.io, et déploiement Docker",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "build": "react-scripts build",
    "test": "jest",
    "start:dev": "nodemon server.js --exec babel-node",
    "start:prod": "node server.js",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Votre nom",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongodb": "^3.6.4",
    "mongoose": "^5.9.11",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.2.0",
    "bcrypt": "^5.0.1",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "multer": "^1.4.2",
    "socket.io": "^4.5.4"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-preset-react": "^6.24.1",
    "jest": "^27.0.6",
    "react-scripts": "^4.0.3",
    "eslint": "^7.13.0"
  }
}
